semantic_identifier: [GOLD-178]: Optimize dedupe/cluster persistence queries and indexes for high-volume ingestion
title: Optimize dedupe/cluster persistence queries and indexes for high-volume ingestion

sections.text: Profile and optimize the DB read/write patterns used during deduplication/clustering and issue-object persistence when ingesting large backlogs. Add/adjust indexes and rewrite the hottest queries (e.g., lookups by source ticket ID, conversation ID, and normalized fingerprint) to reduce full scans and lock contention. Validate improvements with a backfill-sized dataset and ensure idempotency/merge behavior remains unchanged.
